data.text:
Summer Training Camp had started. 
Normally, it was an opportunity to focus on training, but――
data.processed:
󠁿Summer Training Camp had started. 
󠁿Normally, it was an opportunity to focus on training, but――

data.text:
Haaa, haaa! How was Windy-chan's running?! 
All eyes on the beach should be on me――
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿Haaa, haaa! How was Windy-chan's running?! 
󠁿All eyes on the beach should be on me――

data.text:
Biko-chan, you're really fired up! 
Alright, I won't lose to you!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿Biko-chan, you're really fired up! 
󠁿Alright, I won't lose to you!

data.text:
Let's do our best! Just like those three…… 
I'll definitely master Dirt!
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
󠁿Let's do our best! Just like those three…… 
󠁿I'll definitely master Dirt!

data.text:
But they're not! 
Uuuuugh…… if it's come to this～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿But they're not! 
󠁿Uuuuugh…… if it's come to this～!

data.text:
So annoying!! 
So frustratingーー!! Summer Training Camp is stuuuupid!!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿So annoying!! 
󠁿So frustratingーー!! Summer Training Camp is stuuuupid!!

data.text:
The lack of attention was decreaing her motiviation. The lack of 
concentration that comes with that……summer was going to be tough.
data.processed:
󠁿The lack of attention was decreaing her motiviation. The lack of 
󠁿concentration that comes with that……summer was going to be tough.

data.text: That's what I thought, but――
data.processed: 󠁿That's what I thought, but――

data.text: Huh? The Summer Festival is on hold?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: 󠁿Huh? The Summer Festival is on hold?

data.text:
Yeah…… sounds like it overlaps with the 
Summer Festival in the next town over.
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah…… sounds like it overlaps with the 
󠁿Summer Festival in the next town over.

data.text:
If they hold it at the same time, people would 
probably head to the next town anyways, so they 
weren't going to hold it this year……
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿If they hold it at the same time, people would 
󠁿probably head to the next town anyways, so they 
󠁿weren't going to hold it this year……

data.text:
But, if it's in the next town, we'll have to worry about curfew…… 
Haaa～ guess we're passing on a Summer Festival this year.
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
󠁿But, if it's in the next town, we'll have to worry about curfew…… 
󠁿Haaa～ guess we're passing on a Summer Festival this year.

data.text: …………Hmmmmm.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: 󠁿…………Hmmmmm.

data.text:
I was planning on taking Shinko Windy to the Summer Festival 
as a reward for training…… but it can't be helped.
data.processed:
󠁿I was planning on taking Shinko Windy to the Summer Festival 
󠁿as a reward for training…… but it can't be helped.

data.text:
Even after it had become night, Shinko 
Windy hadn't returned to the lodgings.
data.processed:
󠁿Even after it had become night, Shinko 
󠁿Windy hadn't returned to the lodgings.

data.text:
I was searching for her on a footpath 
that had no lights. And then――
data.processed:
󠁿I was searching for her on a footpath 
󠁿that had no lights. And then――

data.text: Kyaaa-!?
data.processed: 󠁿Kyaaa-!?

data.text: Gyaaaa!! S-spare me-!!
data.processed: 󠁿Gyaaaa!! S-spare me-!!

data.text:
From the other side of the forest, more screams could be heard. 
Did something happen? She didn't get involved, did she?
data.processed:
󠁿From the other side of the forest, more screams could be heard. 
󠁿Did something happen? She didn't get involved, did she?

data.text:
Uoooooh～～～～! It's exhilirating! 
It boggles the mind!
data.name: Village Chief
data.processed:
󠁿Uoooooh～～～～! It's exhilirating! 
󠁿It boggles the mind!

data.text:
Waaa haa haa haa! 
C'mon, c'mon, more! There's more fun to be had over here!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿Waaa haa haa haa! 
󠁿C'mon, c'mon, more! There's more fun to be had over here!

data.text:
Following the lively voices, I came across a row of lights 
and hand-made flags―― it was a small festival.
data.processed:
󠁿Following the lively voices, I came across a row of lights 
󠁿and hand-made flags―― it was a small festival.

data.text:
Hm? Ah, Trainer!! 
How is it, Windy-chan's festival!? It's really lively, isn't it!?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿Hm? Ah, Trainer!! 
󠁿How is it, Windy-chan's festival!? It's really lively, isn't it!?

data.text:
Horse radish in the Takoyaki! A lottery with only one type of 
prize! And the Stage Event, a Surprise-In-The-Box tournament!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿Horse radish in the Takoyaki! A lottery with only one type of 
󠁿prize! And the Stage Event, a Surprise-In-The-Box tournament!

data.text:
With the help of Windy-chan's pranks, 
there's no way this festival would lose～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿With the help of Windy-chan's pranks, 
󠁿there's no way this festival would lose～!

data.text:
Gyaaーーーー!! 
Ahー, I got the takoyaki with horse radish in it!
data.name: Villager A
data.processed:
󠁿Gyaaーーーー!! 
󠁿Ahー, I got the takoyaki with horse radish in it!

data.text:
Hiiiiii!? 
What's inside this box? It's so slippery and cold～!
data.name: Villager B
data.processed:
󠁿Hiiiiii!? 
󠁿What's inside this box? It's so slippery and cold～!

data.text:
C'mon, c'mon, go on and guess what's inside～♪ 
Windy-chan's special prank materials are waiting～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿C'mon, c'mon, go on and guess what's inside～♪ 
󠁿Windy-chan's special prank materials are waiting～!

data.text: I've never been to a festival like this! There's so much variety!
data.name: Villager C
data.processed: 󠁿I've never been to a festival like this! There's so much variety!

data.text:
That's true! Hey, with this, we won't overlap too much with the 
other town, right? It's almost a completely different thing!
data.name: Villager D
data.processed:
󠁿That's true! Hey, with this, we won't overlap too much with the 
󠁿other town, right? It's almost a completely different thing!

data.text:
With the ideas given to us by the Tracen Academy student, 
there's no reason not to. Right, everyone!?
data.name: Village Chief
data.processed:
󠁿With the ideas given to us by the Tracen Academy student, 
󠁿there's no reason not to. Right, everyone!?

data.text: Yeaaaah!!
data.name: Villagers
data.processed: 󠁿Yeaaaah!!

data.text:
The rumors quickly spread through the training camp, 
and the Uma Musume came one after the other.
data.processed:
󠁿The rumors quickly spread through the training camp, 
󠁿and the Uma Musume came one after the other.

data.text:
Thanks, Windy-chan! 
I can't help but be excited!
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿Thanks, Windy-chan! 
󠁿I can't help but be excited!

data.text:
Takoyaki with horse radish, 
that's Windy-chan's idea!? Amazing!
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
󠁿Takoyaki with horse radish, 
󠁿that's Windy-chan's idea!? Amazing!

data.text:
We never could have come up with anything like this. 
We'll try to think of something for next year too, thanks!
data.name: Villager A
data.processed:
󠁿We never could have come up with anything like this. 
󠁿We'll try to think of something for next year too, thanks!

data.text: ……Ni shi shi♪
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: 󠁿……Ni shi shi♪

data.text: Phew, it's finally over～!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: 󠁿Phew, it's finally over～!

data.text: Clean up's kind of annoying……
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: 󠁿Clean up's kind of annoying……

data.text:
Well of course it was! When it comes to pranks, 
Windy-chan is a genius! You know that already, right!?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿Well of course it was! When it comes to pranks, 
󠁿Windy-chan is a genius! You know that already, right!?

data.text:
……You said it before. 
Windy-chan's creativity is amazing.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿……You said it before. 
󠁿Windy-chan's creativity is amazing.

data.text:
Since I'm the King of Darkness. 
Of course, the ideas would keep coming.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿Since I'm the King of Darkness. 
󠁿Of course, the ideas would keep coming.

data.text:
But, well…… 
If Windy-chan didn't use her ideas freely……
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿But, well…… 
󠁿If Windy-chan didn't use her ideas freely……

data.text:
It would just…… um, right! 
They would just go to waste! All those ideas!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿It would just…… um, right! 
󠁿They would just go to waste! All those ideas!

data.text:
That's why, I decided that sharing a 
few of them wouldn't be such a bad idea.
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I decided that sharing a 
󠁿few of them wouldn't be such a bad idea.

data.text:
……In short! Giving prank ideas to those that need them! 
Make everyone rely on Windy-chan and become her minions!
data.name: Shinko Windy

choices.text: There will probably be more now, huh
There will probably be more now, huh

data.processed:
󠁿……In short! Giving prank ideas to those that need them! 
󠁿Make everyone rely on Windy-chan and become her minions!

data.text:
Yeah! Now, 
everyone will need Windy-chan's pranks!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah! Now, 
󠁿everyone will need Windy-chan's pranks!

data.text:
In that case, we'll be short-staffed so, 
I'll appoint you as my permanent assistant!
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed:
󠁿In that case, we'll be short-staffed so, 
󠁿I'll appoint you as my permanent assistant!

data.text: ……Doesn't that make you happy?
data.name: Shinko Windy
data.processed: 󠁿……Doesn't that make you happy?

data.text:
Her face was smug and full of expectations. 
So I nodded without hesitation.
data.processed:
󠁿Her face was smug and full of expectations. 
󠁿So I nodded without hesitation.

title: Bite In To The Special Menu!
